name: Hold me tight
description:
The game is in spanish because it was for a spanish jam, but you dont need to understand what it says except maybe in the options menu

Hold me tight was made for the GameJam Alicante 2023 in 48h, with the theme "Sobre dos ruedas" or "On two wheels"

In Hold me tight, you (1 or 2 players) control two wheels wich are connected by a strange rope that stiffens at your will, and with that the gameplay changes radically.  When the rope is in "strong mode", one of the players must be touching the ground but the other one can freely rotate around pivoting on the grounded player and when the rope is in "soft mode", both players can roll by themselves in order to gain horizontal speed but they wont be able to gain height.
Your job is to climb all over the level using only your skill, this two wheels and the rope that holds them together.

Credits:
  • Cletus2000: Programming, Game design and Visuals
  • Jsala: Game design, Level design and Visuals
  • Nerea127: Level design, Game design and Modelling
  • Roscarul: Music, SFX and Game design
  • Various free visual assets from the Unity Asset Store where used
How to play: -Keyboard:
  • A and D to control one wheel, Left and Right arrows to control the other one
  • Shift or Spacebar to change the rope mode
  • Backspace to restart
-Controller:
  • Left joystick to control one wheel and Rigth joystick to control the other one
  • LB(L1) or RB(R1) to change the rope mode
  • Start to restart
